name: Swifstream
description: Transactional networking tool for corporate finance

team.name: Anthony Campbell
team.bioHtml: Founder at Swifstream, a transaction networking tool through which PE funds, companies, technical partners, bank, debt funds and professional advisors interact.

jobs.title: DEVELOPER TO INTEGRATE AN API: METEOR, METORJS, REACT
jobs.description:
## Project overview:
- Web development / Existing project
- Expected to be completed by 2018/10/12

## Project details:
Dear Sir / Madam

We are looking for someone to help us to integrate the API below into a platform that we have built. 

The API is contained in the link below. You have to be familiar with Meteor to do this. It is quite an advanced API.

http://documentation.lemonway.fr/api-en

We are looking to implement the crowd lending / equity crowd funding flow contained in the link below.

https://support.lemonway.com/hc/en-us/articles/115003944109-Step-02-What-is-the-payment-flow-scheme-applicable-to-my-activity-type-

In addition to the $450 on offer, we are willing to offer you further payment in the form of a revenue agreement where you will be offered payment of a more significant sum from first revenues generated from the platform 

Best Regards
Anthony
